'''''"This Flamegranate Isn't Just for Show!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series X]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use an exploding [[Flamegranate]] to defeat the [[Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King]].
